Command.Name: crypt on
Command.Description: This command is used to turn on secure conversation

Command.Name: crypt off
Command.Description: This command is used to turn off secure conversation

Command.Name: crypt handshake
Command.Description: This command is used to handshake AES key
Command.Parameters: Send AES key to remote user.

Command.Name: crypt newkey
Command.Description: This command is used to create new AES key
